data.name: Swap Horses In Midstream
data.description:
# Scenario 

*Now The competition gets tough ,and You can * **_Swap Horses In Midstream_** . 

**_Horses_** are the **_numbers_** ![!alt](https://i.imgur.com/mdX8dJP.png) ![!alt](https://i.imgur.com/mdX8dJP.png) 

___
# Task

**_Given_** an *array/list [] of n integers* , **_Replace all the occurrences of passed integer with substitutionElement_**  ![!alt](https://i.imgur.com/mdX8dJP.png) ![!alt](https://i.imgur.com/mdX8dJP.png)  
___
# Notes


* **_Array/list_** size is *at least **_3_*** .

* **_Array/list_** numbers could be a *mixture of positives , negatives* .

* **_Have no fear_** , *It is guaranteed that* **passed integer within the vector's/list Elements** , But *the substitutionElement is Out Of it* ![!alt](https://i.imgur.com/mdX8dJP.png)  

* **_Repetition_** of numbers in *the array/list could occur* , So **_(Duplications are included when replacing)_**.
____
# Input >> Output Examples:

```cpp
1- swapHorses ({12,16,10},10,29) ==> return ({12,16,29}) 
```

## **_Explanation_**:

**_Since_** , **_Passed integer is_** `10` , that Will be Replaced by `29` , So it **_Returned array\list after Replacemnt_**  `{12,16,29}` 
___

```cpp
2- swapHorses ({-3,-18,-1,-18,-6,-3,-28},-18,25) ==> return ({-3,25,-1,25,-6,-3,-28}) 
```

## **_Explanation_**:

* **_Since_** , **_Passed integer is_** `-18` , that Will be Replaced by `25` , So it **_Returned array\list after Replacemnt_**  `{-3,25,-1,25,-6,-3,-28}` 

* **_Remember_** , *Duplications are included when replacing* , that's Why all the `-18` are replaced in the Vector above By `25` .
____

```cpp
3- swapHorses ({29,-24,17,25,-24,-14,-25,17},17,27) ==> return ({29,-24,27,25,-24,-14,-25,27}) 
```

## **_Explanation_**:

* **_Since_** , **_Passed integer is_** `17` , that Will be Replaced by `27` , So it **_Returned array\list after Replacemnt_**  `{29,-24,27,25,-24,-14,-25,27}` 

* **_Remember_** , *Duplications are included when replacing* , that's Why all the `17` are replaced in the Vector above By `27` .
____
____
___
